name: Github - Browser Default Fonts
description: Removes Github's font stack, replacing it wish simple serif/sans-serify/monospace defaults. Fixes weird spacing for me on Linux.
additional_info: Screenshot shows my browser default fonts, which happen to be Fira sans/mono. Emoji stack supports Apple, Windows, Google (via Noto) and Linux (Symbola).
css:
@-moz-document domain("github.com") {
body,
.markdown-body,
.default-label .sha .ellipses
{ font-family: sans-serif; }

pre,
code,
kbd,
.input-monospace,
.sha,
.commit-desc pre,
.commit-tease-sha,
.blob-num,
.blob-code-inner,
.CodeMirror-lines,
.gollum-editor-body,
.expanded textarea,
.CommunityTemplate-highlight,
.file-info,
.hook-delivery-guid,
.hook-delivery-response-status,
.news .alert .branch-link,
.export-phrase pre,
.tag-references>li.commit,
.uploaded-files .filename,
.oauth-app-info-container dl.keys dd,
.two-factor-recovery-codes,
.two-factor-secret
{ font-family: monospace; }

g-emoji
{ font-family:"Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Noto Color Emoji", Symbola, sans-serif }
}
